name: Words+Dreams
0:
”Alexa, open words plus dreams”
”tell me about author”
”help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: words plus dreams
des:
We communicate, we dream wistfully about the past and predict the future with hope and fear as we struggle to create our vision of a perfect world. Welcome to ever more words…and dreams.
To start the skill you can say, "Alexa, open words plus dreams".
Features-
AUTHOR PROFILE: You can learn more about the author by simply saying, "Alexa, tell me about author."
PURCHASING (Alexa Shopping Actions): You can purchase books directly with Alexa. Use the following commands to shop with Alexa from the Skill-
- Alexa, buy still amazed
- Alexa, buy disabled literature
- Alexa, purchase down at the pier

CHECK WEBSITE AND AUTHOR PROFILE: If you are using this skill from a display-enabled device, you can check the official website by clicking the "Author" button to check the author profile and click the "Website" button from the display to check the official website.
You can say, "Thank you" to end the session.

This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
